page.title: Zoom X6v ASDL VoIP Wireless Router, Series 1067 (5697)

revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Zoom |model=5697 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/27/2008 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,analog phone gateway,dsl modem |fcc_id=BDN1067WL |ic_id=1535A-1067 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Conexant |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Conexant |wi1_chip2_model=CX50221 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=zoom |default_ssid_regex=^zoom$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=user |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.zoomtel.com/techsupport/adsl/adsl_x6v.shtml Support page]
"2007.12/27 X6V" appears to be silkscreened on the top of the board in the FCC photos. "C67003000X6V02L" appears to be silkscreened on the opposite side.
This device is shown as using CX50221-11Z + CX3505IMZ.
This FCC ID appears to cover the 5695 and 5697 models. :The 5697 does not appear to have an external RP-SMA connector.
US: BDNIT01A1067
Default settings are per '''Zoom''''s manual. The FCC manual specifies different credentials (specifically, admin:zoomDSL@10.0.0.2).
